attributes.action: All MP's to resign immediately as they will not honour the will of the people.
attributes.background:
The question that was asked had a result of leave. The detail can happen after the fact.
They were elected to represent the people which they are clearly not. A deal does not involve an opposition party interested in it's own gain.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
